title: snake game
content: 设计Snake – design• Screen Layout – Border, Status, Motion Area• use a turtle object with transparent body color (blank string “”) and solid border, have itstretched to match the size of the desired dimension, or draw the borders with move()• Handling of user interaction – Mouse Click, Keyboard, Turtle Graphics• Motion Refresh – auto vs manual (sync update via timer)• Food Items – alignment of the food items with the head of the snake, plusavoiding overlapping among food items• Monster – motion towards the snake, plus its alignment with the snake• Snake – motion of the snake + body, as well as its tail extension• Detection of overlapping and direction between 2 turtle objects• Game time – tracking total game time via “time” module 思路start with demo what is the use of timer?? for arrow key-manual refresh—-when the time is up, pick the last key pressed-turn on screen refresh by calling turtle.tracer(0)if auto refresh, 会出现不能直角转方向？ move method 1–clone-4stepclone the headchange the clormovedelet the last one–问题：如果不清除之前产生的turtle对象可能会让内存爆 expensive method 2–stamp()-save imagecopy the turtle shapemove-stamp-move-stamp在每次move的地方留下stampthen turtle.clearstamps()正数清除最初的，负数清除最后的color()stamp()color()setheading()forward()see Lec.11.pdf moster use distance to detect overlap-size is 20 towards-give the angle-use angle to set heading tail extension–same as movejust not delet the last one the function left to achievemultiple monster（4）set boarderdisplay food 独立功能实现 pause–done利用设定running_status的布尔值来控制running_status== not running status *press any arrow keys will un-pause the motion!!–这个搞不定 food-数量：5 front: 18,Arial,bold –done display on random place as a turtle object using write() alignment–保证蛇头总是正对食物–把screen切割成小正方形区域？ randomly shifting–distance:40p timer:random(5,10),direction:random(up down left write) detect consumption food随机移动坐标限制！！！ sanke–done tail extension–把food consumption和tail extension绑定 slow down when extending–用timer减慢速度 -increase time rate monsters-数量：4-done random initial location–但是和蛇头保持距离say distance>50 random speed–用timer随机速度 count for body contact with snake–based on timer, Each time the monster is re-positioned, it should then check if it overlaps with any part of the snake. game status–状态显示-done show contact counts show the time of entire game–bind timer to counter timer-no faster than 0.2sec frequency of movements in a interval–speed control–separate for monster and snake *refresh manually, turn off auto refresh(calling tracer(0) and call update to refresh) monster move in range little faster/slower than snake blocking—改进pause()!!!!!!思路：换heading然后改变状态 block the sanke to the boundary–pause game end 判定：snake consume all the food and fully extension game setup–done 初始界面：snake in the center and randomly place the monster onscreenclick –then display food debug日志 pause –启发：g_key_pressed is None使游戏最开始的时候on_timer的循环一直卡在这里不往下进行，所以最开始使暂停状态顺序真的很重要！！！特别是对if！！ 只需要给空格设定一个不会使蛇移动的方向就行（pause），不在HEADING里面 需要恢复时只需要读取上一个方向键或者输入新的方向(g_key_pressed = key)（这里由on_arrow_key控制键盘行动） food随机移动问题（可以糊弄过去）但是别忘了，那个他妈的坐标发癫，以及到边界就不移动了 –解决：笑嘻了 拿移动前的坐标去check哈哈哈哈小姐姐太天才了 检测蛇吃到food的机制有问题，有时候蛇还没移动到数字就判定了–food坐标更新？–检查food position –food的y坐标与蛇头太对齐了导致的，所以蛇头在food正上方时就是10px,但是蛇的位移又是20的倍数–>微调食物坐标 monster容易重叠？ contact–如果身体有重叠就会算两次，接触点在两个块中间也会算两次–改进？ –除以2 作弊了算是 blocking

title: 自救指南
content: 爱不适合娇惯者，爱适合战士！去战斗，去面对，去堂堂正正地审视自己和他人，去寻找爱的本质。爱自己。爱他人。不要把爱和欲望混为一谈。 RE-LABEL明确定义想法或者冲动的具体内容 RE-ATTRIBUTE将想法和感受分离，重新审视，询问为什么这种冲动如此强烈 RE-FOCUS替换活动 RE-VALUE认识癔症和幻想带来的客观伤害 RE-CREATEWhat is the life you really want?尊重自己的创造力和表达
